metadata.title: CVE-2024-40933 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:iio: temperature: mlx90635: Fix ERR_PTR dereference in mlx90635_probe()When devm_regmap_init_i2c() fails, regmap_ee could be error pointer,instead of checking for IS_ERR(regmap_ee), regmap is checked which lookslike a copy paste error.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
